name: Brunnerhof
description: Central position between Hippach and Zell, sunbathing lawn, ski cellar with ski boot heating, ski bus and cross-country track nearby, walk to our own mountain pasture (Grün Alm), childrens playground
Check in 12.00 o´clock - Check out 10.00 o´clock

image.caption: Brunnerhof in Laimach, Hippach im Zillertal
